InstructionData.Title: Prime Decoder
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Prime Bit Decoder​ # Model: PRD-100​ alias Bit0 d0​ alias Bit1 d1​ alias Bit2 d2​ alias Bit3 d3​ alias Bit4 d4​ alias Bits d5​ ​# primes=3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17​ start:​ l r0 Bits Setting​ ​mod r1 r0 3​ seq r1 r1 0​ ​s Bit0 On r1​ ​mod r1 r0 5​ seq r1 r1 0​ s Bit1 On r1​ ​mod r1 r0 7​ seq r1 r1 0​ s Bit2 On r1​ ​mod r1 r0 11​ seq r1 r1 0​ s Bit3 On r1​ ​mod r1 r0 13​ seq r1 r1 0​ s Bit4 On r1​ ​yield​ j start
